typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		firstname as string,
		lastname as string,
		emailaddress as string,
		phone as string,
		contactid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LegacyContact
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LegacyAccount
LegacyContact sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: '',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: '',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	corpusPath: '',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: '',
	truncate: false,
	mapColumn(
		firstname
	)) ~> sink1
